title: Skeptoid #1027: Radioactive Relics: The Missing RTGs
description:
Radioactive nuclear generators sit out in the environment, posing a real hazard. They're mostly — but not all — in Russia.

Learn about your ad choices: dovetail.prx.org/ad-choices
content:
by Brian DunningFebruary 10, 2026
Sponsor an episode!
The Arctic coast of Russia is about as remote and unforgiving a place as there is. Go east from Norway and youll follow 24,000 kilometers of co… [+12357 chars]
de:
Skeptoid #1027: Radioaktive Relikte: Die fehlenden RTGs. Radioaktive Kerngeneratoren befinden sich in der Umwelt und stellen eine echte Gefahr dar. Sie befinden sich größtenteils – aber nicht alle – in Russland.

Erfahren Sie mehr über Ihre Anzeigenauswahl: dovetail.prx.org/ad-choices
en:
Skeptoid #1027: Radioactive Relics: The Missing RTGs. Radioactive nuclear generators sit out in the environment, posing a real hazard. They're mostly — but not all — in Russia.

Learn about your ad choices: dovetail.prx.org/ad-choices
la:
Skeptoid # 1027: Reliquiae radioactivae: Absentis RTGs. Generatores nuclei radioactivos in ambitu sedent, aleam realem ponentes. Plerumque sunt — sed non omnes — in Russia.
